LTE Cat-M1 cellular. Higher bandwidth than NB-IoT (375kbps). Supports VoLTE. Same module often supports both NB-IoT and LTE-M. Requires SIM + antenna.
Industrial serial bus. Half-duplex differential pair. Requires MAX485 or similar transceiver. 120 ohm termination at bus ends.
IEEE 802.15.4 mesh protocol. Transport layer for Matter smart home standard. Supported by nRF52840. IPv6 native.
Passive infrared motion sensor. Digital output (GPIO). Common in security and occupancy sensing.
Current and power measurement. INA219 for DC, SCT-013 CT clamp for AC mains. Smart energy monitoring.
Infrared remote control. TSOP38238 receiver + IR LED transmitter. Smart home universal remote.
Industrial sensor standard current loop input. Requires precision shunt resistor + ADC. Opens IIoT gateway market.
Near Field Communication. Device provisioning, Matter 1.4 onboarding, tap-to-pair. PN532 or ST25DV.
Optical heart rate and blood oxygen sensor. MAX30102. Wearable health monitoring.
LRA or ERM vibration motor with DRV2605 driver. Wearable notifications and feedback.
Capacitive soil moisture sensor. Analogue output via ADC. Smart agriculture staple.
HX711 load cell amplifier. Smart scales, tank level by weight, industrial weighing.
Legacy serial interface. MAX3232 level shifter converts 3.3V UART to ±12V RS-232. DB9 connector. Common for legacy industrial gear, GPS receivers, debug consoles.
Full-duplex differential serial. 4-wire (TX+/TX-, RX+/RX-). MAX490 transceiver. Used in CNC, motion control, long-distance serial links.
Building automation standard. Controls dimmers, VFDs, damper actuators. MCP4725 DAC + op-amp gain stage. Requires higher voltage rail (12-24V).
P-MOSFET high-side switch. Cuts power to external modules/sensors. Essential for battery-powered IoT deep sleep — power-gate GPS, cellular, sensors.
Millimetre-wave radar presence sensor. Detects stationary humans via micro-movement (breathing). Works through thin walls. LD2410C or LD2412. UART interface.
I2S digital audio bus. INMP441 MEMS mic for input, MAX98357A I2S DAC+amp for output. Core requirement for voice assistants (ESPHome/Home Assistant).
Low-power bistable display. Retains image without power. SPI interface. Ideal for battery-powered status dashboards. Waveshare modules most common.

HC-SR04 ultrasonic ranging. 2cm to 4m range. Trigger+Echo GPIO interface. Robotics, tank level, parking sensors. Needs 5V supply.
Magnetic reed switch input. GPIO with pull-up. Security, smart home automation. External reed switch connects via 2-pin header.
Hall-effect pulse output water flow sensor. GPIO interrupt counting. Smart water metering, irrigation monitoring. YF-S201 or similar.
MFRC522 or PN532 RFID/NFC reader. SPI or I2C. Access control, attendance, inventory tagging. Reads MIFARE Classic/Ultralight, NTAG.
TCS34725 color sensor with IR filter and white LED. I2C. Color sorting, ambient light color temperature, display calibration.
